virtual FloorPlaneEst* Omek::SeqFileTracking::getFloorPlaneEstimator ( ) const [virtual]

The FloorPlaneEst object keeps track of and estimates the floor plane and useful parameters, such as: is there a valid (real and visible floor), the camera look-down inclination angle, the perpendicular height of the camera from the floor plane, and the vector direction and distance from a given point in world-space coordinates to the floor plane.

the maximal number of candidates that are supported in this session

the number of candidates in the scene
virtual unsigned int Omek::SeqFileTracking::getNumOfActivePlayers ( unsigned int *  idArr = NULL) const [virtual]

Get the number of tracked players.

This method returns the number of players tracked and stores their ids in an array (if it is given). The number of tracked players is not the necessarily equal to the number of player we are trying to track!

[in] idArr A pointer to the array in which to store the ids

Returns:
0 If no players are being tracked
virtual const Skeleton* Omek::SeqFileTracking::getSkeleton ( unsigned int  index,
bool  rotated 
) const [virtual]

Accessors for skeleton of the given player containing results for last frame Assumed to be called after the init or update methods has been invoked, and yield data relating to last tracked frame If there is no player in the given index return NULL.
